name: Form: Reflection
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You transform into an exact copy of a target creature within 90 feet that you can see. Your hit points are unchanged - you gain temporary hit points equal to half the target's current hit points instead. You otherwise lose access to all of your normal statistics and equipment and use the target's statistics and equipment instead. If the target can cast spells, you only have access to those spells.

You can concentrate on a spell your target has as well as this spell.

This spell ends early when your temporary hit points are depleted.
